ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Provided relief and rehabilitation to more than 22000 families during the last 5years. On an average 5000 persons per year are benefited out of the welfare activities implemented.More than 4000 persons are capacitated every year through non formal trainings and education.Every year on average 2500 persons in the target area are benefited out of the income generation activities.Every year more than 300 village CBOs are formed and mobilized savings more than 1 crore. PMSSS conducts Skill Training for youth and women, provide them job placements.Ever year more than 3000 youth benefit from Skill development program. Governing body and general body facilitated for need base programs and projects to enable the target communities for their integral development. Organizational structure broad based and strengthened to reach out and full fill the need of the poor and marginalized through community Mobilization. Staff equipped with relevant knowledge, networked with govt. departments, institutions and NGOs. Both local and foreign resources are tapped to an considerable extent to satisfy the welfare and economical needs of the mobilized community. Wide range of linkages established with PRIs, district, regional, state, national and international level, govt. and non governmental agencies and expert institutions through projects, technological interventions and community related support programs.

ngoList.title: Puducherry Cooperative Book Society
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The Puducherry Co-operative Book Society was started in 1997 to publish and distribute books, conduct book exhibitions, and other related literary activities. It is governed by the elected board of directors. For the past 20 years, every year conducting book fairs and literary programmes. So far published more than 100 books. There are more than 90 book publishers, distributors and sellers from across the country are participating in the fair. More than one lakh books have been displayed for 10 days. There are several types of literary events for the school and college students such as essay, music programme, instrumental music, singing, elocution, poetry, drawing and painting competitions. Besides offering 10% discounts on all books, there are special considerations for institutions purchasing books in large numbers. All kinds of books related to text books for schools, colleges and professional courses, various types of dictionaries, Encyclopedias, computer related books, soft ware CDs, learning tools through computers, literature, competitive studies, general readings such as cookery, self improvement books are attractive collections for the people of Pondicherry. This book fair will help the society to create a thirst for books which in turn create a thirst on the development of the Union Territory of Puducherry.
